description: Health bosses in Jersey say they will focus on rolling out first doses.
title: Covid: Plan to vaccinate 50k islanders in Jersey by April
title_page: Covid: Plan to vaccinate 50k islanders in Jersey by April - BBC News
maintext: He said this would help the whole island achieve immunity from Covid-19 more quickly as people would be ready for the required second dose sooner, rather than getting two doses in clusters while others awaited their first injection.
